channel.title: Favorite Roll Table?
channel.description: I love a good creative prompt. The provocative language, quirky details, and clever positioning put me into a space where my categories of knowing the world are rearranged. Sometimes those come in the form of a narrative description of a character (Troika) or a faction (Spire). But sometimes I like the chaos and randomness of the roll table. So what are your favorite roll tables that prompt your creative juices? The Codex is a great space for this, but what other games, supplements, or sites do you return to?
